00025 /*
00026 ** Define BT_EXTERN
00027 */
00028 #ifdef __cplusplus
00029 #define BT_EXTERN extern "C"
00030 #else /* __cplusplus */
00031 #define BT_EXTERN extern
00032 #endif /* __cplusplus */
00033 
00034 /*
00035 ** Define BT_METHOD (Calling Method)
00036 */
00037 
00038 #if !defined(BT973) && !defined(WINVER) && !defined(BT15901) \
00039     && !defined(BT15991) && !defined(BT17903) && !defined(BT13908)
00040 
00041 #define BT_METHOD
00042 
00043 #else  /* !defined(BT973) && !defined(WINVER) && !defined(BT15901) \
00044           && !defined(BT15991) && !defined(BT17903) && !defined(BT13908) */
00045 
00046 /* Windows requires __stdcall between the return type and the function
00047    name- so we can't just hide it in BT_EXTERN. */
00048 
00049 #define BT_METHOD __stdcall
00050 
00051 #endif /* !defined(BT973) && !defined(WINVER) && !defined(BT15901) \
00052           && !defined(BT15991) && !defined(BT17903) && !defined(BT13908) */
00053

00056 **  Product specific include files
00057 **
00058 *****************************************************************************/
00059 
00060 #if defined(BT25801)
00061 #include "btuapi.h"     /* VMEbus broadcast memory specific include file */
00062 /* defined(BT25801) */
00063 
00064 #elif defined(BT21805)
00065 #include "btuapi.h"     /* Universe specific include file */
00066 /* defined(BT21805) */
00067

00070 /* defined(BT28801) */

00075 #define BT_NTDRIVER
00076 #endif /* !defined(BT_NTDRIVER) */
00077 /* defined(BT973) || defined(WINVER) */
00078 
00079 #elif defined(BT993)
00080 #include "btpapi.h"
00081 /* defined(BT993) */
00082 
00083 #elif defined(BT965)
00084 #include "btpapi.h"
00085 /* defined(BT965) */
00086

00089 /* defined(BT946) */

00097 /* defined(BT18902) */

00100 #include "btmapi.h"     /* Broadcast/Shared Memory specific include file */

00103 #endif /* !defined(BT_NTDRIVER) */
00104 /* defined(BT15901) */

00112 /* defined(BT15906) */
00113 
00114 #elif defined(BT17903)
00115 #include "btuapi.h"     /* NanoBridge specific include file */
00116 #if !defined(BT_NTDRIVER)
00117 #define BT_NTDRIVER
00118 #endif /* !defined(BT_NTDRIVER) */
00119 /* defined(BT17903) */
00120 
00121 #elif defined(BT13908)
00122 #include "btfapi.h"

00126 /* defined(BT13908) */

00129 #include "btpapi.h"    /* Nanobus specific include file */

00131 #else
00132 #error Undefined project!
00133 
00134 /*
00135 ** If you've got this error, you need to define one of the project
00136 ** identifiers (i.e. BT973, etc.).  Please examine the example source
00137 ** provided with your driver for which identifier to define, and how
00138 ** to define it.
00139 **
00140 ** In addition, the various Windows drivers should also define
00141 ** BT_NTDRIVER.
00142 */
00143 
00144 #endif
